rdsInstance.initializationQuery:
CREATE TABLE entity (
	id INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	currency VARCHAR(10),
	type VARCHAR(255),
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
CREATE TABLE transaction (
	id INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
	transaction_id VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
	set_id VARCHAR(255),
	date DATE,
	entity_id INT NOT NULL,
	cheque_no VARCHAR(50),
	voucher_no VARCHAR(50),
	is_credit INT,
	amount DOUBLE,
	notes VARCHAR(255),
	reconcile INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (id),
	FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES entity (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);




CREATE TABLE conversion (
	id INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
	transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	to_currency VARCHAR(10),
	from_currency VARCHAR(10),
	rate DOUBLE,
	PRIMARY KEY (id),
	FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transaction (transaction_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

insert into entity (id, name, currency, type) values (1, "Cash", "LKR", "ASSETS");
insert into entity (id, name, currency, type) values (2, "Bank", "LKR", "ASSETS");
insert into entity (id, name, currency, type) values (3, "Sales", "LKR", "INCOME");

query.query: SELECT count(*) as count FROM transaction;
SELECT count(*) as count FROM transaction;

params.query: DELETE t2 FROM transaction t1 INNER JOIN entity e ON t1.entity_id=e.id INNER JOIN transaction t2 ON t1.set_id=t2.set_id WHERE e.name=?

query.query: SELECT count(*) as count FROM transaction;

params.query: SELECT E.name AS name, SUM( IF(T.is_credit='1', -1*T.amount, T.amount)) AS value FROM transaction T INNER JOIN entity E on T.entity_id=E.id GROUP BY E.id;

query.query: SELECT count(*) as count FROM transaction;
SELECT count(*) as count FROM transaction;
